SimilarGroups.SimilarityNote: Both requirements focus on enabling users to schedule virtual gatherings using voice commands.
SimilarGroups.DifferenceNote: Although both requirements serve the same function, they may target different user personas with varying levels of comfort with technology.

UnifiedRequirement.Name: Unified Virtual Gathering Scheduling
UnifiedRequirement.Description: The system shall enable users to schedule virtual gatherings with friends or family using voice commands, streamlining the process for users who may feel overwhelmed by technology.

Conflicts.Note: While the caregiver dashboard focuses on monitoring health regimens, the secure communication channel emphasizes data privacy and security, potentially causing tension in how much data can be shared and accessed.
